document_data.name: Kallimar Bleth
document_data.mainbody: '''Kallimar Bleth''' was a member of the [[Bleth]] noble house of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Description: Kallimar was a large man with dark hair.
document_data.Personality: Kallimar was similar to his ancestor [[Mondar Bleth]], both crude and bad-tempered.
